attributes.action: withdraw from the UN if they do not also denounce Hamas as the cause of Irael`s action in Gaza.
attributes.additional_details: The UN is almost, but not quite, as bad as the political leadership of this country who operate a policy of appeasement against ALL criminals, including convicted terrorists with the blood of hundreds of innocents on their hand who are in this country under the protection of our charter for criminals, The UK Human Rights Act.  The UN MUST be forced to agree that it is Israel, along with Russia which takes appropriate affirmative action against terrorists and if they do not acknowledge Hamas as the cause, WE MUST WITHDRAW FROM THE UN.
